title: Greetings
description: Start with the basics—learn how to say hello, goodbye, introduce yourself, and ask someone how they're doing.

title: Everyday Essentials
description: Master key expressions and questions used in daily life—like asking for the time, help, or directions.

title: Conjugating Verbs
description: Learn how to conjugate and verbs for past, present, and future tenses.

title: People & Family
description: Talk about yourself and the people in your life—learn vocabulary for family members and professions.

title: Around the House
description: Learn the names of rooms, furniture, and household objects, plus verbs for everyday routines.

title: Describing Things
description: Use colors, sizes, and adjectives to describe objects, people, and places clearly and naturally.

title: Food & Drink
description: Order at a restaurant, express your preferences, and learn common foods and drinks.

title: The Weather
description: Talk about the weather, seasons, and climate with confidence in everyday conversation.

title: Verb Tenses
description: Describe and ask for directions to places like the bank, post office, market, or park.

title: Hobbies
description: Share how you spend your leisure time—discuss sports, music, art, and weekend plans.

title: Travel
description: Get around by learning how to talk about public transport, booking trips, and navigating airports or stations.

title: Health & The Body
description: Explain how you feel, name body parts, visit the doctor, and talk about health routines.

title: Shopping & Money
description: Practice shopping for clothes, groceries, and souvenirs—and using currency and prices.

title: We & They
description: Learn rules for converting many english words into spanish.

title: Introducing Yourself
description: Talk about jobs, digital tools, email, and how Spanish is used in professional environments.

title: Feelings and Emotions
description: Learn how to use the past tense to share memories, past actions, and life experiences.

title: Giving Opinions
description: Practice expressing your likes, dislikes, preferences, and personal opinions respectfully.

title: Compliments
description: Dive deeper into verbs, sentence structure, prepositions, and useful grammar tips to boost fluency.

title: Conversations
description: Put it all together—have mini conversations, answer questions, and role-play everyday interactions.
